Considering the observations so far, there are several red flags: unusually low prices, ambiguous privacy notations, hyperlinks with placeholder URLs, and a lack of public discussion or reviews about the website. These factors raise suspicion about the legitimacy of the website. Based on the characteristics of scam websites provided and the observations made, there is sufficient reason to believe that https://www.neubeleuchtung.com/ may be a scam website. I now know the final answer. https://www.neubeleuchtung.com/ appears to be a scam website.
